meanings.definition: A compound containing the nitrosyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the nitrosyls in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Nitrosyls are important in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The nitrosyls in the test tube seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The nitrosyls danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the nitrosyls made them stand out in the mixture.

meanings.definition: A molecule consisting of a nitrogen atom bonded to an oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: She learned about nitrosyls in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The structure of nitrosyls is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The nitrosyls whispered secrets to each other in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: The bond between nitrogen and oxygen in nitrosyls is unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the nitrosyls appeared delicate and intricate.
